text: was a road cyclist from Japan. Her maiden name was . She finished second in the Japanese National Road Race Championships in 2008, and represented her nation at the 2008 UCI Road World Championships. She was diagnosed with acute myeloid leukemia in February 2009 and died of the disease on 2 July 2010. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Cyclingarchives.com Category:1982 births Category:Japanese female cyclists Category:Place of birth missing Category:2010 deaths Category:People from Minoh, Osaka
title: Yuka Uda
